movie_1.title: Star Wars: The Force Awakens
movie_1.cast: Harrison Ford, Mark Hamill, Carrie Fisher, Daisy Ridley
movie_1.plot: Three decades after the defeat of the Galactic Empire, a new threat arises. The First Order attempts to rule the galaxy and only a ragtag group of heroes can stop them, along with the help of the Resistance.

movie_2.plot: A rich high school student tries to boost a new pupil's popularity, but reckons without affairs of the heart getting in the way.
